articles.author: Juliana Kaplan, Reed Alexander, Dakin Campbell
articles.title: The future of America's biggest safety net is in the hands of a career bureaucrat and a hard-charging finance titan - Business Insider
articles.description: Acting commissioner Leland Dudek helms the nearly 60,000-person federal agency. Frank Bisignano, a former JPMorgan Chase and Citigroup executive, waits in the wings.
articles.content:
The Social Security Administration faces a delicate moment. Its future teeters between a career bureaucrat and a former Citigroup and JPMorgan Chase executive who may bring order or further tumult.
… [+11380 chars]
